name: change-table-column-settings
description: Show, hide, or reorder columns in a table. `table_columns` is the current list of columns.

table_columns.description: New list of table columns. You can only change `enabled` property of each column or reorder columns in the list. Do not add new columns and do not remove existing columns from this list.

enabled.description: To make the column visible, set `enabled` to true. To hide the column, set `enabled` to false. If no changes to the column visibility is needed, use the original value for this column from `table_columns`.
